name: Cozy Campfire
description:
I'm a beginner to 48 hour game jams and this is the first one I've managed to complete. This game jam was the 2022 Winter Melonjam with the theme "Cozy". It will most likely be fairly buggy as it has not been tested very thoroughly. Enjoy!

I added this webgl build after the deadline as my original was not working.

I made no changes to the game in this time however.
